Bounce House.card_desc: [Heroic Leap] Heroic Leap now deals 600 damage and knocks up enemies within 20 units of where you land.

Bulk Up.card_desc: [Recovery] Recovery heals for an additional 600 instantly and increases your maximum Health by 300 for 5s.

Bully.card_desc: [Net Shot] Gain {scale=12|12}% lifesteal against targets you hit with Net Shot.

Concussion.card_desc: [Net Shot] Reduce the cooldown of Net Shot by {scale=1|1}s.

Deep Breath.card_desc: [Recovery] Activating Recovery Grants you {scale=6|6}% Damage Reduction for 2s.

Ensnare.card_desc: [Net Shot] Net Shot grants 30% bonus damage for as long as the target is slowed. Lasts a minimum of 2s.

Exhilarate.card_desc: [Heroic Leap] Heal for {scale=120|120} if you hit a champion with Heroic Leap.

Giga Siphon.card_desc: [Recovery] After Recover ends gain {scale=8|8}% Lifesteal for 4s.

Gotcha.card_desc: [Net Shot] Using Net Shot grants {scale=10|10}% movement speed for 3s.

Leg Day.card_desc: [Heroic Leap] Increase the jump strength of Heroic Leap by {scale=5|5}%

Momentum.card_desc: [Heroic Leap] Heroic Leap grants {scale=6|6}% Damage Reduction for 4s.

No Escape.card_desc: [Weapon] Gain {scale=8|8}% movement speed for 8s after getting a Kill.

Rapid Sustain.card_desc: [Armor] While below 50% Health receive {scale=5|5}% increased healing.

Reconstruction.card_desc: [Recovery] Reduce the cooldown of Recovery by {scale=1|1}s.

Seismic Wave.card_desc: [Heroic Leap] Reduce the Cooldown of Heroic Leap by {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Stomping Ground.card_desc: [Weapon] Reduce active cooldowns by {scale=15|15}% when you get a Kill.

Tangled.card_desc: [Net Shot] Increase the duration of Net Shot by {scale=0.3|0.3}s.

Vigor.card_desc: [Recovery] Activating Recovery generates 1 Ammo every 0.5s for {scale=0.5|0.5}s.
